tests {
  name: "invalid PI"
  table_entry_test {
    p4info {
      indirect: "p4_pdpi/testing/main-p4info.pb.txt"
    }
    pi_table_entry_cases {
      name: "empty PI"
      pi: {
      }
    }
  }
}

tests {
  name: "packet-in"
  packet_io_test {
    p4info {
      indirect: "p4_pdpi/testing/main-p4info.pb.txt"
    }
    pi_packet_in_cases {
      name: "ok"
      pi: {
        payload: "1"
        metadata {
          metadata_id: 1
          value: "\x34"
        }
        metadata {
          metadata_id: 2
          value: "eth-1/2/3"
        }
      }
    }

    pi_packet_in_cases {
      name: "duplicate id"
      pi: {
        payload: "1"
        metadata {
          metadata_id: 1
          value: "\x34"
        }
        metadata {
          metadata_id: 1
          value: "\x34"
        }
      }
    }

    pi_packet_in_cases {
      name: "missing metadata"
      pi: {
        payload: "1"
        metadata {
          metadata_id: 1
          value: "\x34"
        }
      }
    }

    ir_packet_in_cases {
      name: "ok"
      ir: {
        payload: "1"
        metadata {
          name: "ingress_port"
          value {
            hex_str: "0034"
          }
        }
        metadata {
          name: "target_egress_port"
          value {
            str: "eth-1/2/3"
          }
        }
      }
    }

    ir_packet_in_cases {
      name: "duplicate name"
      ir: {
        payload: "1"
        metadata {
          name: "ingress_port"
          value {
            hex_str: "0034"
          }
        }
        metadata {
          name: "ingress_port"
          value {
            str: "eth-1/2/3"
          }
        }
      }
    }

    ir_packet_in_cases {
      name: "missing metadata"
      ir: {
        payload: "1"
        metadata {
          name: "ingress_port"
          value {
            hex_str: "0034"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
